recipes.name: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce
recipes.preparation:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain any excess fat.
4. Add tomato sauce and bring to a simmer.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve meat sauce over cooked spaghetti.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.preparation:
1. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill or bake until cooked through.
2. Cut lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
3. Add cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, sliced red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.
4. Slice cooked chicken and add to the bowl.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
6. Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.preparation:
1. Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
2. Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
3. Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
4. Add Parmesan cheese and whisk until melted and smooth.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Slice cooked chicken breast and add to the sauce.
7. Serve Alfredo sauce over cooked fettuccine.
